metadata.feature_description: Display comprehensive user activity metrics including rank, reputation, experience, engagement, influence, and contribution statistics

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View activity details for regular user with activities

steps.expected: Users list displays with action buttons for each user
steps.actual: Users list displayed with Profile Settings, Account Settings, User Roles, and User Activity buttons visible for each regular user

steps.action: Click User Activity button for Test Regular User
steps.expected: Activity details panel expands showing all metrics
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active (38 minutes ago), Rank (7), Reputation (6), Experience (6), Engagement (0), Influence (1), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View activity details for another user

steps.action: Click User Activity button for Test NewUser
steps.expected: Activity details panel expands showing all metrics for this user
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active (7 days ago), Rank (7), Reputation (6), Experience (6), Engagement (0), Influence (1), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity (Joined Site 7 days ago - Evoq Content Library)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify SuperUser activities cannot be viewed

steps.action: Search for 'host' user in Users panel
steps.actual: SuperUser Account (host) displayed in user list

steps.action: Verify available action buttons for SuperUser
steps.expected: User Activity button should NOT be available for SuperUser
steps.actual: Only Profile Settings and Account Settings buttons are visible for SuperUser - User Activity button is NOT present, confirming SuperUser activities cannot be viewed

steps.action: Click Edit Points link in activity panel
steps.expected: Edit form appears with editable Reputation and Experience fields
steps.actual: Edit form appeared with Reputation input (value: 6), Experience input (value: 6), Notes textarea, and Cancel/Save buttons. Rank remains display-only (not editable)

steps.expected: Last Active should display in relative time format
steps.actual: Last Active displayed as '38 minutes ago' and '7 days ago' for different users - relative time formatting working correctly

steps.action: Verify Engagement and Influence display as percentages with progress bars
steps.expected: Engagement and Influence should show numeric values (0-100) with visual progress bars
steps.actual: Engagement showed value 0 with empty progress bar, Influence showed value 1 with minimal filled progress bar - both displaying correctly

steps.expected: Total Contributions should display as a numeric count
steps.actual: Total Contributions displayed as '0 TOTAL CONTRIBUTIONS'

steps.expected: Recent Activity should list activities with timestamps and source
steps.actual: Recent Activity displayed with activity description ('Joined Site'), relative time ('40 minutes ago'), and source ('EVOQ CONTENT LIBRARY')

observations: Social SKU-specific features (Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence) are visible in this Evoq Engage installation, indicating DNNSOCIAL SKU is active
The Edit Points functionality allows administrators to modify Reputation and Experience values with a Notes field for documentation
Rank is calculated and displayed but cannot be directly edited - it appears to be derived from other metrics
User Activity button is intentionally hidden for SuperUser accounts as per the feature design
